EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Email_Spring_Newsletter_2019.Spring_Newsletter_Email_January_2019
EmailTemplate.subject: This Year in Spring
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This Year in Spring January 2019 Happy new year, Spring fans! And welcome to a special installment of This Month in Spring, where we look not only at the last month's news, but also the highlights of the year behind us. 2018 was a year of incredible change on the technology landscape, one that the Spring community has been able to deftly navigate. In this special year-end wrap-up, we'll do what we always do—look at the latest and greatest in the ecosystem—but we'll also revisit the things that I, your friendly neighborhood @starbuxman <[[https://twitter.com/Starbuxman]]>, feel most positively impacted the Spring developer in 2018.
Now, let's get through our usual monthly roundup—and there's tons to look at!—before we review this Year in Spring.
The Long and short of it <[[https://content.pivotal.io/josh-blog/this-year-in-spring-2018-2?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-january-2019]]>
SpringOne Tour Heads to Charlotte, NC
As 2019 begins, the SpringOne Tour bus will make its first stop of the year, rolling into Charlotte, NC <[[https://springonetour.io/2019/charlotte?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-january-2019]]> on January 28. Visit our tour page <[[https://springonetour.io/?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-january-2019]]> for more information on upcoming stops, including St. Louis, Washington, D.C. and Columbus before the tour takes flight and heads to Europe.
Reserve your seat <[[https://springonetour.io/?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-january-2019]]>
Complete the Developer Economics Survey
Be heard. Share your opinions about platforms, languages, frameworks, resources and more! Find out what’s new in the software industry and where it’s going next.
Take the survey <[[https://survey.developereconomics.com/surveys/de16?utm_source=ZLvi9rlT&utm_medium=partner]]>
Links Spring Eternal
In the News Netflix OSS and Spring Boot — Coming Full Circle <[[https://medium.com/netflix-techblog/netflix-oss-and-spring-boot-coming-full-circle-4855947713a0]]>
Webinars Tuesday, January 29 Securing Microservices with Spring and Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/jan-29-securing-microservices-spring-and-pivotal-cloud-foundry-webinar?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-january-2019]]>
Thursday, January 31 Habits of Highly Effective Platform Teams: Unlocking the Value of PCF <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/jan-31-habits-of-highly-effective-platform-teams-the-key-to-unlocking-the-value-of-pivotal-cloud-foundry-webinar?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-january-2019]]>
Visit our blog for even more Spring and Spring-adjacent content <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DrQRS40OKNE]]>.
I want to go to there <[[https://spring.io/?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-january-2019]]>
